H0.text: what are the four nations of the united kingdom. Scotland

H1.text: what are the four nations of the united kingdom. Ireland

H2.text: what are the four nations of the united kingdom. England

H3.text: what are the four nations of the united kingdom. Wales

A4.text: The United Kingdom comprises England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland

A5.text: Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland have their own governments and parliaments which control various devolved matters

A6.text: There is no devolved English government, but an attempt to create a similar system on a sub-regional basis was rejected by referendum.

A7.text: England is governed directly by the Parliament of the United Kingdom, although other countries of the United Kingdom have devolved governments.

A8.text: Scotland is a country that is part of the United Kingdom
